description: The project will identify, develop and implement effective coordination mechanisms within formal government agencies that will establish a coherent environment sectoral approach.

subproject.description: Through the project, the Kiribati will be assisted in the long term to execute more effective aid management and monitoring practices; to continue to work on the Pacific Aid Effectiveness Principles as well as meet its Paris Declaration commitments.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: KIRIBATI Environment Programme

title: KIRIBATI Environment Programme Mainstreaming
